alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 11:27PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Wake Low will impact portions of Barbour and Russell Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1125 PM CST, Emergency Management and weather observers reported strong winds behind a line of weakening rain showers extending from northeast of Bibb City to near Blue Springs State Park. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Eufaula, Clio, Clayton, Louisville, Blue Springs, Tyler Crossroads, Hawkinsville, Spring Hill, Blue Springs State Park, Osco, Richards Crossroads, White Oak, Russell County Sports Complex, Gaino, Seale, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Ladonia and Texasville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
